Pre-Game Insights: The Pistons allowed 15.4 offensive rebounds/game last season -- 5th-best in the NBA; the Hornets averaged 14.3 offensive rebounds per game last season -- 3rd-worst in the NBA.
The Hornets allowed a TS% of 48% in close and late situations last season -- 6th-best in the NBA; the Pistons had a TS% of 49% in close and late situations last season -- 9th-worst in the NBA.
